com.loginradius.sdk.api

Class MessageSendAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.loginradius.sdk.api.LoginRadiusAPI
      • com.loginradius.sdk.api.MessageSendAPI

  • public class MessageSendAPI
extends LoginRadiusAPI
    The MessageSend API is used to post messages to the user’s contacts. After using the Contact API, you can send messages to the retrieved contacts.
